entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is described as a giant, almost twice as tall and five times as wide as a normal man. He has long tangles of bushy black hair and beard, large hands, and feet like baby dolphins.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is described as the professor who is relieved to see Hagrid arrive.

entities.name: sirius black
entities.description: Sirius Black is mentioned as lending his motorbike to Hagrid.

entities.name: motorbike
entities.description: The motorbike is described as huge and borrowed by Hagrid from Sirius Black.

entities.name: house
entities.description: Hagrid mentions that the house was almost destroyed while he rescued Sirius Black.

relationships.description: Hagrid is riding on the motorbike when it lands in front of Dumbledore and Hagrid.
Dumbledore meets Hagrid upon his arrival, sounding relieved to see him.
Sirius Black owns the motorbike that he lent to Hagrid.
Hagrid rescued Sirius Black from a house that was almost destroyed.
